snippet.title: I Made Minecraft in Powerpoint
snippet.description:
A few months ago I made a game in Microsoft Powerpoint, but it wasn’t very good. So today, I want to push Powerpoint to its real limit, by trying to make a working version of Minecraft, with full player controls, building, and mining!

PLAY MINECRAFT POWERPOINT EDITION: https://polymars.itch.io/minecraft-powerpoint-edition

WATCH LIVE ► https://www.twitch.tv/polymars
→ Main Channel - https://youtube.com/polymars
→ Twitter - https://twitter.com/PolyMarsYT
→ Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/polymarsdev/
→ Discord - https://discord.gg/sGecnxuwxu

—If you liked this video, here are similar ones you might enjoy!—

PolyMars++ -  I Made a Game in Powerpoint
https://youtu.be/oenpiKJ-wrk
Sam Hogan - I Made Minecraft in 24 Hours
https://youtu.be/Nj8gt_92c-M
Sam Hogan - I Made Minecraft Without Blocks
https://youtu.be/MazA1SlpwTY
BadGameDev - Can AI Code Minecraft? Watch ChatGPT Try
https://youtu.be/pXnIyRILSkg
jdh - Making Minecraft from scratch in 48 hours (NO GAME ENGINE)
https://youtu.be/Nj8gt_92c-M
DevBanana - Making A Rhythm Game Inside POWERPOINT…
https://youtu.be/YhQaYyDkNJc
Icoso - Making a GAME in POWERPOINT!
https://youtu.be/alGRrR5YXjI

https://youtu.be/sn7lC4K9fmk
PolyMars++ - I made a horror game in 2 hours
https://youtu.be/nxVuNgBPK8E

https://youtu.be/1-KtAkAX1HI
PolyMars++ - Two AIs Compete to Make a Video Game
https://youtu.be/_LjuykOZxvg
PolyMars++ -  I Remade Super Mario Bros From Memory
https://youtu.be/vmYkt4sQ4m8
PolyMars - C++ Developer Learns Python
https://youtu.be/7tXsC8YlCq8
PolyMars - Making a Game With Discord's Bot API
https://youtu.be/0fWdU8JCT6Y
PolyMars - Making a Game With C++ and SDL2
https://youtu.be/iEn0ozP-jxc
PolyMars - Best Python Game Wins $1000 - Game Making Challenge
https://youtu.be/PC_pAgJopIA
PolyMars++ -  He stole my game and made it better
https://youtu.be/Ods3ZsWPlW8

PolyMars++ -  I Found the Oldest Version of Scratch
https://youtu.be/iC-i96qj-5A
